labels.analysis: The MCP Server described is primarily focused on managing Google Tasks, allowing users to interact with their task lists and tasks via an API-driven interface within Claude. The core functionality includes CRUD operations (Create, Read, Update, Delete) on task lists and tasks, as well as task completion and organization. The server also handles authentication via Google OAuth, enabling secure access to the user's Google Tasks. The primary use case is enhancing productivity by integrating task management into conversational AI workflows.
labels.reasoning: The primary label "Daily Productivity" was chosen because the server's tools and functionality are directly related to task management, which falls under personal productivity. "API Integration" is added as a secondary label because the server operates as an intermediary between the AI assistant and Google's API. "Operating System" is excluded since the tools are not system-level operations but rather application-level task management.

remote_server_response.error: unhandled errors in a TaskGroup (1 sub-exception)

server_info_crawled.name: Google Tasks Integration Server
server_info_crawled.author: @arpitbatra123/mcp-googletasks
server_info_crawled.overview: Manage your Google Tasks and task lists directly through Claude with this MCP server. Authenticate securely and perform operations like creating, updating, deleting, and completing tasks seamlessly. Enhance your productivity by integrating Google Tasks management into your conversational AI workflows.

tools.name: authenticate
tools.description: Deploy Server Google Tasks Integration Server Claim Server @arpitbatra123/mcp-googletasks Try in Playground authenticate

tools.name: set-auth-code
tools.description: Set the authentication code received from Google OAuth flow

tools.name: get-tasklist
tools.description: Get a task list by ID

tools.name: list-tasks
tools.description: List all tasks in a task list

tools.name: get-task
tools.description: Get a specific task by ID

tools.name: create-task
tools.description: Create a new task in a task list

tools.name: move-task
tools.description: Move a task to another position

tools.name: clear-completed-tasks
tools.description: Clear all completed tasks from a task list

server_info_crawled.python_sdk:
import mcp
from mcp.client.streamable_http import streamablehttp_client
import json
import base64

smithery_api_key = ""
url = f"https://server.smithery.ai/@arpitbatra123/mcp-googletasks/mcp?api_key={smithery_api_key}"

async def main():
    # Connect to the server using HTTP client
    async with streamablehttp_client(url) as (read_stream, write_stream, _):
        async with mcp.ClientSession(read_stream, write_stream) as session:
            # Initialize the connection
            await session.initialize()
            # List available tools
            tools_result = await session.list_tools()
            print(f"Available tools: {', '.join([t.name for t in tools_result.tools])}")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    import asyncio
    asyncio.run(main())
